mapper.select: SELECT employee_no employeeNo, employee_id employeeId FROM employee WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND employee_pw = PASSWORD(#{employeePw})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee_detail( employee_no, employee_name, employee_gender, employee_phone, employee_email ) VALUES ( #{employeeNo}, #{employeeName}, #{employeeGender}, #{employeePhone}, #{employeeEmail} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(employee_id) FROM employee WHERE employee_id = #{idCk}

SELECT e.branch_no branchNo, ed.employee_name employeeName, ed.employee_phone employeePhone, ed.employee_gender employeeGender, ed.employee_email employeeEmail, e.createdate, e.employee_active employeeActive FROM employee e INNER JOIN employee_detail ed ON e.employee_no = ed.employee_no
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee e INNER JOIN employee_detail ed ON e.employee_no = ed.employee_no

SELECT ed.employee_name employeeName, e.employee_id employeeId, ed.employee_email employeeEmail, ed.employee_phone employeePhone FROM employee e INNER JOIN employee_detail ed ON e.employee_no = ed.employee_no WHERE e.employee_no = #{employeeNo}
